name: A Conversation With A Stranger
description:
A sunrise on a distant planet. A commute to the fields, for harvest. A conversation with her. 

This is a short work of interactive fiction, the length of one conversation on one shuttle ride. I estimate it will take about ten minutes from start to finish, although your total time spent may vary depending on your reading speed and the choices you make. 

Created in Twine. There's no sound or anything like that. It will technically work on mobile, but the layout might not always be ideal. Enjoy! 

Made for Ludum Dare 52: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/52/a-conversation-with-a-stranger
